name: TOW Monica Sings Quiz | 'Friends' Seasons and Episodes | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Chandler want to put out on the balcony?
questions.explanation:
lights.

	Chandler told Ross this after Ross told him about Gavin and Rachel being on the balcony kissing.

questions.text: What did Monica think the crowd at the piano bar was yelling at her?
questions.explanation:
tips.

	Monica thought they were saying tips but in actuality they were saying something else because she wasn't wearing a bra.

questions.text: What part of his body was Joey going to get waxed?
questions.explanation:
eyebrows.

	Joey asked Phoebe and Rachel what they thought about it. Phoebe: "Depends on how far along he is on his sex change."

questions.text: What song did Monica sing first at the piano bar?
questions.explanation:
'Delta Dawn'.

	At the end of the show, Chandler sang (badly) 'Jeremiah Was A Bullfrog'.

questions.text: What name did Joey use when he went to the salon?
questions.explanation:
Chandler Bing.

	He was afraid it would make him look sissy.

no.

	Chandler (after Ross insulted him): "Whadya doin' man you know I can only dish it out."

questions.text: How many people did Chandler tell the girls at the coffee house they needed for a human pyramid?
questions.explanation:
6.

	Chandler (when he needed Ross to intervene): "Swoop! Swoop!"

questions.text: What did Gavin tell Rachel he used to be?
questions.explanation:
Rodeo Clown.

	Rachel: "Seriously, a rodeo clown?" Gavin: "One of the best, ma'am, one of the best."

questions.text: Who did Joey get to help him when he chickened out at the salon and didn't let them finish the wax job?
questions.explanation:
Chandler.

	Chandler used to tweeze his father's eyebrows and after he tweezed Joey's eyebrow he curled his eyelashes.

questions.text: Where did Rachel and Emma go after she and Ross had a fight?
questions.explanation:
Joey's apartment.

	Rachel: "Can Emma and I stay here for a while?" Joey: "Sure."
